org.xchain.framework.jxpath

Class XChainTypeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.BasicTypeConverter
      • org.xchain.framework.jxpath.XChainTypeConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.TypeConverter

    public class XChainTypeConverter
extends org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.BasicTypeConverter

    A type converter for the xchains package. This type converter adds support for Java 5 Enumerations. Any other types are converted by JXPaths BasicTypeConverter.

    Author:
    Christian Trimble

      • canConvert

        public boolean canConvert(java.lang.Object object,
                 java.lang.Class toType)

        This method corrects the canConvert behavior for Java 5 Enum type.

        Specified by:
        canConvert in interface org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.TypeConverter
        Overrides:
        canConvert in class org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.BasicTypeConverter
        Parameters:
        expression - the expression to evaluate.
        toType - the type of object to return.
        Returns:
        true if type type is an enumeration type, otherwise returns super.canConvert(Object, Class)

      • convert

        public java.lang.Object convert(java.lang.Object object,
                       java.lang.Class toType)

        This method corrects the convert behavior for Java 5 Enum type.

        Specified by:
        convert in interface org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.TypeConverter
        Overrides:
        convert in class org.apache.commons.jxpath.util.BasicTypeConverter
        Parameters:
        expression - the expression to evaluate.
        toType - the type of object to return.
        Returns:
        object as an Enum, if toType is an Enum type, otherwise returns super.convert(Object, Class)
